Comments_List: In this course, I got to practice advanced language skills like academic writing and idiomatic phrases and structures. However, it was so much more than a language course. As a class we got an in-depth survey of Persian-language cinema. The professor gave us a great selection of different types of movies (art-house vs mainstream), different genres and cultural backgrounds. It was great to see movies from Tajikistan and Afghanistan included as well as movies popular within Iran. Many courses only show us the art-house movies that win prizes at European festivals, but this course really goes beyond that narrow focus and tries to engage all different types of movies.

In this course, I got to practice advanced language skills like academic writing and idiomatic phrases and structures. However, it was so much more than a language course. As a class we got an in-depth survey of Persian-language cinema. The professor gave us a great selection of different types of movies (art-house vs mainstream), different genres and cultural backgrounds. It was great to see movies from Tajikistan and Afghanistan included as well as movies popular within Iran. Many courses only show us the art-house movies that win prizes at European festivals, but this course really goes beyond that narrow focus and tries to engage all different types of movies.

Was able to improve my Persian language skills while also gaining cultural insight into Iran and the rest of the Persian-speaking world. The class was specifically helpful in strengthening my writing ability.
I wish the course had a second part so we could continue in the spring semester.
I wish the course had a second part so we could continue in the spring semester.

If you have any interest in cinema or Iran, I would highly recommend this course. I think it would be great for historians and students of political science as well because it provides a great window into the culture.

f you have any interest in cinema or Iran, I would highly recommend this course. I think it would be great for historians and students of political science as well because it provides a great window into the culture.
Excellent course for both improving Persian language skills and expanding knowledge of the Persian-speaking world.
